sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: New airstrikes in Ukraine as Russia claims to have inflicted extensive damage on Ukrainian forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Aid agencies in Hungary work to help hundreds of thousands of refugees arriving from Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: As France's farming sector pushes for agricultural independence, local producers are starting to worry about the economic consequences of war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Civilians and officials in Toulouse mark the 10th anniversary of terrorist attacks which killed seven people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Bulgaria's former Prime Minister Boyko Borisov has been released after 24 hours in police custody for suspected misuse of public funds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Russian Defence Ministry has released videos of what it says are airstrikes on Ukrainian military targets as the battle to influence perceptions of the conflict intensifies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The video of unspecified locations follows the announcement that it had used a hypersonic missile in combat for the first time, saying it had destroyed an underground weapons warehouse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In total, said Defense Ministry spokesperson Igor Konashenkov, since the beginning of the special military operation, 196 Ukrainian drones, 1,438 tanks and combat vehicles, as well as 1,237 special military vehicles have been destroyed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian forces were also hit in Mykolaiv, where dozens of soldiers are believed to have been killed in an airstrike at their brigade headquarters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The search for survivors continues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian government, for its part, claims to have killed 14,000 Russian soldiers since fighting began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There are tactical battles of local importance, said a Ukrainian spokesperson.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The main focus of the enemy remains the same.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The direction is Izium, Volnovaka, Mariupol, Mykolaiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: According to preliminary data, the commander of the 8th All-Military Army of the Southern Military District of the Russian Federation was killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian government has conceded it's losing control of the now heavily damaged Azovstal steel plant in Mariupol.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It said 10 humanitarian corridors have been agreed with Russian forces, including one from the devastated port city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: More than 290,000 refugees have already arrived in Hungary from Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The aid organization Migration Aid is working to help them find accommodation with a converted workers' hostel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: There are 64 rooms and 280 beds here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The operation is sustained through a combination of donations and volunteers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After a while, in every crisis, people are starting to get tired, he says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: That's why I also tell our volunteers, some of whom are sleeping here and they only sleep for an hour or two, I say it's a marathon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: So if you want to help, also in a week or two, relax, take a day off.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Don't do it constantly because you will burn out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At Budapest's Eastern Railway Station, organisations and churches have created a children's corner. Here mothers can feed the youngest children and preschoolers can play. According to the UNHCR, almost half of the refugees are children. Adolescents are often seen drawing and they're trying to manage their trauma this way.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A reporter says most of the volunteers I talked to in the children's corner all say they were very tired and the vulnerability of little children is mentally burdening them too. They also said that at the same time, when they feel they can help someone, it gives them strength.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Sath, a sleepy agricultural hub in the northwest of France, is some 2,000 kilometers from the war in Ukraine. The region is currently battling an outbreak of bird flu, but residents are also feeling the pinch. Local farmers are facing a sharp increase in energy and cereal prices as relations between Russia and the European Union go from bad to worse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This pig and chicken farmer says there is a direct impact in our farms. The price that we sell our chicken hasn't really changed, while we have a 50% increase in the cost of our animals because of the increase of grain and raw material prices so this situation is unbearable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The bloc approved a fresh raft of sanctions earlier this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But as prices continue to rise, dairy farmer Philippe wonders what will happen in the short and medium term.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He says I hope that the EU and the government will protect the farming sector because we have the means to produce our food locally and feed our citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: France has long encouraged Europe to become more independent in its agricultural production. While France produces most of its own wheat, corn and rapeseed, the country is still heavily dependent on Russian fertilizer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Local people in Toulouse, along with politicians, military personnel and representatives of the Jewish community, have been marking the 10th anniversary of a series of terrorist attacks in which seven people were killed by Islamist gunman Mohamed Meira.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The commemoration comes ahead of events on Sunday, which will bring together 2,000 guests, including French President Emmanuel Macron and Israeli President Isaac Herzog.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Former heads of state Francois Hollande and Nicolas Sarkozy and members of the Muslim faith will also attend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On 19 March 2012, three Jewish schoolchildren and their teacher were among those shot at a Jewish school in Toulouse. The children were aged between just eight and three years old.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After a manhunt, Mira was shot dead by police on March 22, following a 30-hour siege at his Toulouse apartment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Four days before the Toulouse attacks, Mira, who was Algerian-French, had shot two off-duty uniformed French soldiers and seriously wounded another in Montauban.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Before he was tracked down and killed, he had filmed all of his attacks on a body-worn camera and made a video which he distributed to TV news channels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Bulgaria's ex-Prime Minister Boyiko Borisov has been released from custody.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Serb party leader and three of his officials were detained for 24 hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Borisov's lawyer Menko Menkov said the arrest was part of an investigation into alleged extortion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: However, prosecutors failed to come up with sufficient evidence to press charges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On his release, the three-time Prime Minister told his supporters, next time they can kill me.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: While Borisov is the highest ranking politician to be arrested in the country, his detention has rocked Bulgaria's parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some lawmakers were heard chanting for his resignation on Friday, while the opposition GERB party stormed out of the session and joined protesters in front of Sofia's parliament building, calling for his release.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: However, current Prime Minister Kirill Petrov says that no Bulgarian is above the law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Borisov was subject to corruption allegations several times during his tenure, but has denied any wrongdoing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Petrov's We Continue the Change party won last year's election on an anti-corruption ticket.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's been 11 years since the revolution in northern Syria began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Despite years of deadly Russian-backed offensives, thousands of protesters at the rebel enclave of Idlib took to the streets this week, calling for an end to the Assad regime.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Five million people have fled the country since the uprising began, while some 500,000 lives have been lost as the brutal crackdown on democracy continues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Brazil's Supreme Court has blocked popular messaging app Telegram in a bid to battle the spread of disinformation ahead of this year's presidential election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The move follows Telegram's failure to comply with previous rulings and remove accounts disseminating fake news. Telegram is widely used by President Bolsonaro and his supporters. Justice Alessandra de Moraes says Telecom's regulator Anatel has 24 hours to implement the suspension.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Three Russian cosmonauts have safely arrived at the International Space Station. The crew

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: blasted off from their launch facility in Kazakhstan and docked their capsule at the International Space Station. The crew blasted off from their launch facility in Kazakhstan and docked their capsule at the lab just three hours later.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Space veteran Oleg Armatiyev and rookies Denis Matveyev and Sergey Korsakov were greeted by a crew of two Russians, four Americans and one German. The trio were the first new arrivals to the space station since Russia's assault on Ukraine began. Five historic cemeteries have been discovered in the Saqqara region of western Cairo that are the burial places of leading figures from more than 4,500 years ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Saqqara is part of the Memphis Cemetery, named after the god Sekir from the Old Kingdom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some tombs are for major statesmen, but one is for the wife of a man named Yart and another for a woman called Betty.
